practice_phrases: A book.
一本书。
She needs a book.
她需要一本书。
He doesn't need a book.
他不需要一本书。
She needs to buy a book.
她需要买一本书。
He doesn't need to buy a book.
他不需要买一本书。
She could put a book on the table.
她可以把一本书放在桌子上。
He doesn't need to buy a book this time.
他这次不需要买一本书。
Do you think she needs to buy a book on Monday?
你觉得她星期一需要买一本书吗？
She needs to buy a book this year if she wanted to.
她如果想的话今年需要买一本书。
He doesn't need to buy a book on Monday this year.
他今年星期一不需要买一本书。
